name: Mini Higher Standard 3-Piece Cream Glow Blush Stick Set
about: What it is:A limited-edition, mini set featuring three creamy, high-pigment blushes made for every skin tone, type, and occasion..Highlighted Ingredients:- Kaolin Clay: Reduces the appearance of pores and limits excess shine..Ingredient Callouts:These products are vegan, gluten-free, and cruelty-free..What Else You Need to Know:This all-in-one blush kit transforms your look and enhances your complexion with vibrant pigments for a quick pop of color. The three fan-favorite shades have a lightweight, easy-to-blend, vegan formula that provides striking color and luminosity. Featuring LYS Beautyu2019s signature triangle shape, the blush sticks easily maneuver around your face, nose, and cheeks to deliver a healthy-looking glow with every swipe..This Set Contains:.Clean at Sephora
ingredients: -Kaolin Clay: Reduces the appearance of pores and limits excess shine..-Avocado Oil: Locks in lasting hydration..-Vitamin E: Calms and soothes...Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Diisostearyl Malate, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Polyisobutene, Synthetic Wax, Ceresin, Octyldodecanol, Citrullus Lanatus (Watermelon) Fruit Extract, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Rosa Rubiginosa (Rosehip) Seed Oil, Rosin, Sodium Hyaluronate, Aluminum Hydroxide, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Caprylyl Glycol, Ethylhexyl Palmitate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Glucomannan, Phenoxyethanol, Tocopheryl Acetate, Trihydroxystearin, May Contain: Red 6 Lake (CI 15850), Red 7 Lake (CI 15850), Blue 1 Lake (CI 42090), Barium Sulfate (CI 77120), Tin Oxide (CI 77861), Titanium Dioxide (CI 77891)...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply to apples of cheeks using a blush brush (sold separately)..-Apply excess product onto bridge of nose, lips, and hairline for a youthful look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this stick cream blushes.  They blend easily, good pigmentation. The only thing is that once you applied them the colors look alike. It also adds a subtle glow. I mean you can see the difference but itu2019s kind of subtle thatu2019s why 4 stars. I recommend to set it with a powder blush with a similar color.

reviews.review_title: I always applies every single day
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: These blushes are so pretty and pigmented and youu2019re getting 3 mini blushes in 34 dollars and one blush in full size cost 27 dollars so itu2019s really good that youu2019re getting 3 in 34 ud83dude0dud83eudd2dud83eudd2ditu2019s a great deal! Just grab it ud83eudd2dud83eudd70ud83eudd70ud83eudd70

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Best value , pigment , quality and selection of colors.

reviews.review_title: A must have in my makeup routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, notSure skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using this product I absolutely can not go back to any other cream blush! This formula is easy to blend, buildable, and just overall an amazingly built product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love these blushes! This size is perfect for travel and Iu2019m happy that I got to try multiple shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love lys products but Iu2019m a fair neutral girlie and these blushes are so dark for me. I thought there was a light pink one but no light colors at all! Iu2019m a little disappointed but I could mix colors

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These 3 colors are so stunning! Glowy but not glittery, and you need the smallest amount. Theyu2019ll last forever. Very pigmented so using a brush and applying to the back of my hand 1st works best.I paid for these products, not a paid review.

reviews.review_title: Too bright for a blush, perfect as a lipstick ud83dudc84
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These colors are really too bright for blush on my nearly fair skin. However, they are perfect as lipstick. Seriously just use these as lipstick. I love the triangle tube.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was on the fence about purchasing this set but couldnu2019t help myself since I wanted to try the shade bubbly and love minis. Even from a quick swatch it was easy to tell the quality was there at a great price point. Highly recommend this as a gift to any blush lover!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am truly obsessed with this blush trio; all three colors complement my skin tone beautifully. The size of the mini trio also makes it easy to throw in your purse for touch-ups later.u2764ufe0f

This set is amazing and great for people who are indecisive about what blush shade they want to wear. This will also make a great gift giving idea for any makeup lover. They blend out like a DREAM! Highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received these in exchange for my honest review and I love them! I was scared of the darker shade since I am fair with blonde hair and blue eyes. Although I do wear a self tanner slightly on my face. I always spray my face with setting spray first, then I place the blush where I want, I spray my beauty blender with the setting spray and pat/blend. Highly recommended!! Loved all the shades on me!

reviews.review_title: Try it on your lips too!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I put this on my lipsu2026 and I am OBSESSED. This is the most fun purchase I have ever made. The look on the lips is highly underrated. Festive, STAYS, and even with eating a full dinner, wears down in the middle softly.

reviews.review_title: I am in awe at how much I love these!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Could these be any more beautiful?! From the stunning packaging to the luminous luxurious blush itself, these exceed expectations! The tubes have a beautiful iridescence that gives a subtle blue flare in the light. Application is a breeze with this smooth creamy formula that blends seamlessly. In addition, the variety of universally flattering colors is just squeal worthy! I am in love with these and they are perfect for stockings or a purse!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Holy cow, these are pigmented! I was between ordering 2 colors and this set had both so I figured why not try it. This is NOT a swipe from the tube and blend blush (at least not if you're the shade of paper, like me). I dab a brush ever so slightly on the product and it blends out beautifully. I would imagine these could work on any skin tone since they are incredibly pigmented. I now have the blushes and bronzer stick (the foundation stick was a bit of a fail for me)...I plan on trying more products from LYS. Great brand!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely love these blushes. Theyu2019re so pigmented and I absolutely love the way they apply their last all day and theyu2019re so so cute. And itu2019s such a good deal because you get three in one price.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: These are my go to blushes. I just love them. The blend easily for a natural looking flush. These look very flattering on my skin too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019ve been hearing so many good things about these blushes and I finally had the chance to try them out for myself and now I completely agree with what everyone is saying! These are very pigmented all the girlies can wear these. They do have a bit of a shimmer in them, but Iu2019m shimmer girl so Iu2019m here for it! Definitely plan on trying more products by LYS

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love these blushes! They are super blendable and have good buildable coverage. No bad smell. Not super shimmery which is good.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Creamy, Beautiful colors! I have the regular size ones & I think these are so cute! And perfect for stocking stuffers for friends or sisters!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Can you tell which is my favorite?ud83eudd2d I LOVE how pigmented, vibrant, and versatile these blushes are! A little goes a long way, and they last FOREVER!

reviews.review_title: Wow! Beautiful and thoughtfully assembled set.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If you want a versatile selection of high quality luminous blushes at a great price, don't miss out on this set!  You can get subtle or dramatic color depending on how much you apply, and it blends so easily. The colors are a nice range of warm to cool. A tiny amount gives a  glowy flush without being too intense for work. I will definitely purchase my favorite shade in full size!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: These blush sticks are beautiful!! They are so creamy, just like their contour and foundation sticks and blend like an absolute dream. The colors are so perfect for every season and so universal and inclusive!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the new blush stick set!  Theyu2019re easy to use and great size for travel. The colors are vibrant and very pigmented!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The products are so cute and easy to take everywhere. I love all the colors, bery easy to apply and also very buildable. My to go blush stick from now on

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Absolutely loving the shade range. These adorable smaller blushes are highly pigmented and The texture is creamy and smooth. I like To blend them with either a sponge of Brush but occasionally use my finger Tips  to evenly spread the color in the area i want it. I also like to wear it as a lipstick for a pop of color. Perfect gift For the holidays for anyone looking try. Package is adorably as always  To simple but beautiful

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this kit! On top of the amazing price the colors are sooo pretty and complement my makeup so well! Will definitely be ordering for my makeup loving family/friends for Christmas. u2728ud83dude0dud83dudd25

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the result of using the blush! Having these cuties would make any look lovely!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoy these blush stixs, they wore well throughout the day and they come in such gorgeous shades. They applied seamlessly without separating and wore well throughout the whole day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Omg I am in love with these cream blushes ud83dude0d they are so creamy and pigmented, they blend so easy. Only a tiny bit is needed. I love it

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Su00faper cute ! Creamy and perfect for the holidays ud83dudc95ud83dudc95.

reviews.review_title: Zero stars don't waste your money
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If I could give zero stars for this product I would. The packaging is so bad that the product broke from the first use. Moreover, I did not like the quality of the product. It disappears in seconds. Do not waste your money.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this blush set, the perfect size to put in your purse. These blushes are super pigmented, creamy, easily blendable, and long-lasting. I love how affordable LYS brand is. It's high quality at an affordable price. These blushes are an absolute staple in my makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this set! The blushes are stunning. Each color brings its own unique flavor and they are not similar so you can create unique looks. I have a medium-warm complexion and the blushes all show up so vibrant and pretty on me. I love it and you will too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love LYS blushes and having these great stick formulas in a smaller trio is the perfect option for gifts, travel, or even to try out multiple colors! Theyu2019re so smooth to apply and pigmented, but you can still blend them out to find the perfect wash of color. Highly recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love these mini blush sticks from LYS! Just as pigmented as the full size and they blend just as easily. Perfect for your purse or for travel. Love the shades and that you donu2019t need to use a lot to get a gorgeous color payoff. Would definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this cream blush ! The shades are pigmented and a lil goes a long way . Itu2019s matte formula but looks so glowy ! Itu2019s lightweight and blends smooth and seamlessly. The mini are perfect for traveling and space saving . The packaging is pretty and the performance is amazing !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: OMG don't walk, RUN GIRL! This blush is super pigmented and pretty! It slides on my face like butter and blends so flawless. If you're looking for a creamy blush that works well for combo skin, I would definitely recommend it!! I'm in love with this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Love this blush so much. The colour is beautiful and goes on so smoothly. You can layer it so easily for more pigment. Leaves such a nice glow on the cheeks. Love this clean, BIPOC brand.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Nice color payoff but these feel really heavy on the skin. Not for natural makeup, more like if you do full beat.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love this so much the shade range is literally gorgeous. I love the applicator and the packaging. Definitely recommend. ufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful colors but it slides off the skin soooo fast. Might be good for dry skin, but not for oily skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So blend able, creamy, pigmented, and an overall beautiful cream blush. Would repurchase 1000 times!!

reviews.review_title: Pleasantly surprised by price! Staple in routine!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: So nice and creamy! What a price for such a nice product. Donu2019t waste too he money on expensive blushes!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I already love this brandu2019s cream blush & I love a glowy blush in general. This blush is beginner friendly, glides on & blends out easily. The color payoff is even more beautiful in person. Iu2019ve used this blush alone, with cream/liquid blushes & even on top of powder blush u2014 it doesnu2019t pick up, pill, or remove whatever is underneath. I set my face with matte products & the blush will still have a glow to it. Love it & I will purchase more shades. Iu2019ve been using my current one for 3 months (everyday) & thereu2019s still so much product left. This blush is a great price, quality product & the product itself contains a large amount

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I ordered this online so I wasnu2019t really sure what to expect. But it says itu2019s Soft Pink. Which is not true. Itu2019s a really dark pigmented pink. With glitter in it. Iu2019m just not a fan of glitter blushes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Super pigmented, I love it especially the prices. Best if used before applying foundation. Also apply very lightly for a natural look for those days without foundation

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent. Blends in very well and stays on for a long time.  I would buy again.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I love this color, like that I itu2019s highlight and blush in one. Easy to use and a little goes a long way.

reviews.review_title: Not my choice . Colours like clown
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Soft pink !  u2026all this line like clown make up colours  . To dark . Created should reduce the colour pigment 2 steps down on all shades . Wooof come on I tried all colours no way. Packaging bulky. Go for slimmer packaging. Easy for travelling. Oh.. boy..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: extremely pigmented and great payoff. you only need a little bit to get the effect you're looking for. with this brand, i think everything is really pigmented cause the bronzer is the same way.

reviews.review_title: Can a product be TOO pigmented?
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, gray hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a lovely color. The glow is perfect with no glitter sparkle. It lasts. So what's my beef? This product is TOO pigmented to be applied in a simple swipe. I have to use a fluffy brush to pick up a little color, then apply and blend. This isn't what I wanted from a stick blusher u2013 I wanted more of an easy-peasy swipe-and-go blush that doesn't require an extra brush in my routine. I'm sure all the pigment will be perfect for some people, though.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I'm very happy with this blush stick.  I have very fair skin, so I use a teeny-tiny amount and it blends in well.  Lasts til I take it off.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful, VERY pigmented blush. On me, it has more of a peachy tone to it, has a nice shimmer, like a blush highlighter.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I I am enjoying my LYS Cream Glow Blush Stick in Sof Pink. I usually use powder blush, but I like this product a lot. I purchased Soft Pink and it is very pigmented. I apply it with a brush/ beauty  bBu00f1ende

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Color is very pigmented at the beginning but fades and appears blotchy quickly. The glow does stay. A powder blush helps.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I got this in soft pink but it was   BRIGHT hot pink almost red. I found it kinda sticky and hard to blend. Even using a brush to pick up the product it was wayyy too much. Good price but just a bit sticky and definitely not the colour I thought it would be

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Love the glow this gives my skin! Itu2019s very pigmented and will probably last me two years ud83eudd23 I love the ingredients too

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is beautiful, itu2019s glowy but not glittery. Colour payoff is wonderful, and staying power is great. Just be careful when you use it, it is super pigmented.
Le blush en baton est arrive briseu2026 Il manque du produit. Je suis tres deu00e7u pour le prixu2026

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: So easy to use and wonderful color payoff. Itu2019s pigmented but applies very easily. The color wore all day..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Unfortunately its way too pigmented for me bc i have light skin. I used the tiniest amount (Bubbly) and it was still pretty shocking on me. It is a beautiful formula and d the packaging is so pretty so if you can do a very pigmented blush its a must!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my new favorite blush! Itu2019s so sleek and easy to use. A little goes a long way, so it will last forever. It gives the most beautiful glow and pop of color to my face. I will be using it all throughout spring and summer!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is so easy to blend out and is not to bright unless you want it to be, it is super light on your skin and is not oily at all. I definitely recommend this blush.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Super pigmented blush. A little goes a long way.  Very nice product.

reviews.review_title: Beautiful color for my medium olive neutral tone
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m not one for cream blushes but had to try this color. I love it. Very pretty color and blends nicely.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: THIS product shows up perfectly on my skin, its very pink and stays all day

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love the formula of these blush sticks! They provide such great color pay off but are easy to blend so if you are a beginner at makeup, donu2019t feel intimidated by these. It also leaves the most beautiful radiance to the skin without being too much. Overall this is easily a new favorite for me!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush surprised me so much! The shimmer it gave off was so stunning! I also was surprised at how well the product glided onto my face so effortlessly. And love how it can be used one my lips!! ud83dudc96ud83dudc96ud83dudc96ud83dudc96

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is chefs kiss ! You definitely need ! The presentation of it , the pigmentation, the finish Iu2019m obsessed! It has a glowy finish to it you donu2019t need highlight.

reviews.review_title: Lovely addition to the LYS blush lineup!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This product is SO LOVELY - it slides on so easily and smooth with plenty of pigment. But it blends out gorgeously and has a bit of iridescence  in it to give it that beautiful glow. I love their cream blush formula for its satin finish and am so happy I get another LYS blush that can give me a gentle glow too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: gorgeous! I love the color and it applies so creamy and blends perfectly! I thought I loved the LYS blushes before but these are next level! I definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush is so creamy & pigmented! Glides across your skin like butter & I love that theyu2019re so affordable. Honestly a little goes a long way & they will last you forever!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m somewhat new to the blush community, but this product makes it enjoyable and easy. Itu2019s well pigmented so you can use as little or as much as youu2019d like and still glow. It looks good on my darker skin and Iu2019m glad to have it added in my makeup routine.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: u201cFocused u201c is such a beautiful shade it blends out so naturally or you can build up the color . Im a blush girly myself and only had to apply 2x for my desired look . It feels so hydrating on skin doesnu2019t feel heavy or greasy and leaves a beautiful glow!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The LYS Beauty Higher Standard Cream Glow Blush Stick has a smooth and creamy  texture that applies seamlessly on to the skin. The velvety formula is ultra pigmented and blends effortlessly with a shimmery finish. The shade Focused is the perfect warm pink for a sun-kissed complexion. It is long wearing and wears beautifully throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: very pretty very pigmented but way to much glitter for me.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Way too much pearl / shimmer and not as buildable as expected

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I loooooove these new blushes from LYS! Super creamy and pigmented, very easy to blend on the skin and last all day, the component is so slick and feminine and I love how affordable LyS products are! Another big hit in my collection

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the shades they have to offer. A little goes a long way!!!! When I first got it I just stamped it on my cheek & I was like omg I put too much. I recommend applying on the back of your hand & then onto your cheek. I love the pigmentation & the consistency of this product. The container is so fun & I didnu2019t really feel like it had a scent to it.

reviews.review_title: Very pigmented and easy to blend!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: If youu2019ve dealt with blushes consistently not showing up on your skin, this is your solution!  Out of all the cream blushes Iu2019ve experimented with, LYS takes the cake for being the most pigmented.  You can swipe these sticks straight on to your cheeks for a bold look or use a brush to pick up color from the blush stick before applying it to your cheeks for a more subdued look.  You can easily twist up the stick to access more product and twist it down to secure it inside the cap so no blush accidentally gets scraped off the side.  The blush is velvety smooth and doesnu2019t dry down quickly so you have time to blend.  The finish of the blush gives a dewy, hydrated effect to the face.  There is no visible glitter or shimmer.  On my fair skin, shade Focused is a brick red.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: beautiful really, this color just didn't work for me.  it in fact is very warm, so it pulled orangey on me.  I'm debating on elite or bubbly now to repurchase before they are sold out!  the shimmer and application is great! I just swiped it on and used a brush just like the bronzer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is such a creamy product. This shade is extremely pigmented so I only need a little. It blends extremely well and doesn't dry out my skin. There is a slight shimmer that looks so pretty. I would say it is a true mauve shade. I even use it as a lippie since it's so creamy, and the triangle shape actually makes it easy to apply on the lips.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Received this for free in exchange for an honest review. I love this blush stick - the color courageous is more of like a blush lighter and itu2019s very pigmented! Looks great on all skin.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I am sharing my honest and authentic opinion, as a Sephora Beauty Insider Community Ambassador. I am so impressed with this cream blush. Focused is a warm, beautiful shade. There is so much pigment and colour payoff. It blends very easily. I wear this under a powder and use a setting spray and I get a natural glowy look all day. This cream blush is great price, compared to others.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have this blush in Elite-Mauve color, love how creamy and pigmented the formula is, you just need a little bit of product and it will last the whole day. It has a beautiful  glowy finish and contains great ingredients. Love thepackaging too Love   Love

reviews.review_title: A little goes a long way
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love the formula and itu2019s very pigmented! Definitely my new favorite blush and a little goes a long way

reviews.review_title: Ten out of ten. The most beautiful blush sticks
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Do yourself a favour and get this blush, itu2019s creamy, pigmented and BEAUTIFUL. This has become my new go to/favourite, it is also affordable compare to other blush sticks in my opinion. Definitely will buy again. HIGHLY RECOMMEND

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love this shade! This has been my most reach for within the past week. I love that it's super buildable but also super pigmented a little does go a long way. It blends out so beautifully. I love that the shade has such a creamy texture but once you blend it out into place,  it stays.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this in exchange for my honest review.  WOW you need to checkout the NEW LYS Beauty Higher Standard Cream Glow Blush Stick.  I was sent shade ELITE which is a stunning Mauve shade. Used my LYS Stippling Brush to blend and Iu2019m just loving the finish.  It is super pigmented and creamy, so start off lightly and you can easily build up for more intensity. Itu2019s super lightweight and really adds a beautiful flush and glow to the skin. Available is 7 shades and Iu2019m sure Iu2019ll be trying out those soon!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Feel the warmth rise to your cheeks with@Lysbeauty LYS Beauty Higher Standard Cream Glow Blush Stick. Itu2019s a subtle one made in a nice twist of format for a smooth effortless application. I love how this dewy ultra-creamy formula layers perfectly to achieve a natural flush of pigment on the cheeks and contour your features.It brightens up my  face, adds a healthy glow , while giving me a youthful look all in one step. Itu2019s the best way to add a pop of color to your look.  Iu2019m definitely buying more shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely love LYS Beauty bronzer stick, so this launch was something Iu2019ve been waiting for! I mean those colors are gorgeous! After trying u201cFocusedu201d I really want to check out that soft pink color named u201cBubblyu201d. It offers a convenient application method similar to the bronzer. With a formula consisting a subtle sparkle it transforms into a dewy finish on the cheeks providing a luminous effect. The pigment is HERE! Be aware that a little goes a long way. Itu2019s easy in applications so you can use your fingers, a sponge or a brush. I prefer a brush because thatu2019s how I use my bronzer.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Tried this for the first time today and Iu2019m in love! Love the Higher Standard Satin Matte in u201cConfidentu201d. The shade u201cFocusedu201d is her glow-y sister ud83dude0d Easy to blend, definitely a spring staple!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I love this product! Packagingu2026 stunning pink iridescentu2026lovely.  Ease of use? YES! The tiniest dot will go on and on! Value? Absolutely! Very little product is needed so it will last! Color stayed strong all day! Itu2019s a winner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: its not a soft pink at all if you use too much, and in fact is kinda red. you need to be careful with your application and blend it out rlly well. i would recommend this for brown girls n darker. the blush itself broke when i tried to pushbit up immediately

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin

reviews.review_title: Warm cinnamon is such a vibe.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I got warm cinnamon and it gives my olive skin a deep yet beautiful bronzed highlight! Itu2019s a burgundy/burnt orange hue that really accentuates tanned golden skin! It has a slight shimmer and is so creamy, it just glides right on! Itu2019s easily blendable and really stays on too! I am super happy with LYS Beauty product and want to try more colors!!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin

reviews.review_text: Absolutely creamy beautiful, glowing blush. I love to wear it as highlighter. I wear it on my lips high on my cheekbones to give me a more sculpted look like really Dewey because I have really dry skin and this is so creamy and blends so well.ufffc

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was recently gifted this blush and I have to say, IM OBSESSED! Itu2019s super creamy and easy to blend and leaves a gorgeous finish!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This blush stick is so creamy and blends out really well! It's highly pigmented and, truly, a little goes a long way. I also love the shimmer in the blush, it creates a really nice highlight on your cheeks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Iu2019m in the range of deep skin tone and the shade focus looks so well on me! This product is very creamy and a little goes a long way but not overpowering. I love how it blends out as well! So smooth! Definitely recommend!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: OMG! I love this blush stick! I am such a huge fan of LYS Beauty and this blush is awesome! The pigment is so pretty and the texture is great. And letu2019s talk about all of LYS Beauty packagingu2026it applies so nicely and easily and makes the great product even better!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this blush! Itu2019s creamy, bold, and pigmented. It feels comfortable on the skin and it blends out beautifully. I feel mauve is the perfect shade for me. Itu2019s soft and feminine, which is what I usually go for. A little goes a long way. I recommend applying it with a brush instead of directly to the face.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The blush is bright and GLOWY in a way thatu2019s hard to capture on camera. Itu2019s super pigmented but also so creamy, so a little goes a long way. I love that I can sheer it out or build it up depending on the coverage Iu2019m looking for!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: So this was my first time trying Lys beauty and I am shocked, this blush itu2019s gorgeous, the color is beautiful, it blends like a dream and itu2019s extremely pigmented so a little bit goes along the way, it leave your cheeks with a healthy glow

reviews.review_text: These are incredibly pigmented & blend like a dream! A little goes a long way! I have the shade outgoing, but I canu2019t wait to get my hands on more shades!

reviews.review_text: This goes on just as smoothly as the contour stick. It is EXTREMELY pigmented, so this will last you a LONG time. I have medium fair skin and this color looks like it was made for me. I love it.
